amendment.description: An amendment to specify that the act shall take immediate effect with regard to any violation of a state law regulating the importation or transportation of any intoxicating liquor which results from any violation of a state's firearms laws.

action.text: Mr. Scarborough raised a point of order against the Lofgren amendment (A005). Mr. Scarborough stated that the amendment is not germane. The Chair sustained the point of order.
